InstallÂ¶

Steps to initialize the project on a local machine:

  1. git clone https://github.com/Talengi/EDMS.git repository
  2. virtualenv venv
  3. . venv/bin/activate
  4. pip install -r repository/requirements/local.txt
  5. cd repository
  6. python EDMS/manage.py syncdb –noinput –settings=EDMS.settings.local
  7. fab runserver
